story_16_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Here they are, Father!
It’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team!
story_16_01000/2401_0401_0400_10:
I like your spirit!
But this will not go as you hope!
story_16_01000/2401_0302_0500_10:
You never know.
We haven’t even battled yet.
story_16_01000/2401_0402_0600_10:
We can already see the results, for the battle
has already started!
story_16_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
We are modern ninjas, living in the shadows.
We have mastered the art of espionage.
We already know everything about you!
story_16_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
You should be flattered. Father only prepares like
this for opponents that he considers formidable.
story_16_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Some would say that we rely too much on
underhanded tactics...
story_16_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
But that is not the truth. A true ninja masters
many strategic techniques!
story_16_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Don’t think that your conventional strategies
will work against us!
story_16_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Allow us to show you that there are battles
you cannot overcome with strength alone!
